attributes.action: explain to the electorate of this country, in a public statement, why it is acceptable for an Iraqi citizen who would be a danger to the people of Iraq to be kept in this country (without asking him if he wants to go home to Iraq) where he will be a threat to the people who are paying for his existence without being given an opportunity NOT to pay for him to be kept alive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anybody who needs an explanation or elucidation of the point of this petition really ought to get on a plane to a Islamic country!

rejection.details: We do accept petitions on individual cases
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
